NeatGenomeBuilderFactory
public static
NeatGenomeBuilderFactory​<T>
where T : struct

Static factory class for creating instances of INeatGenomeBuilder{T}.

Type Parameter
T

Neural net numeric data type.

Functions
Create
public static INeatGenomeBuilder<T> Create(
MetaNeatGenome<T> metaNeatGenome,
bool validateAcyclic =  false
)

Create a new instance of INeatGenomeBuilder{T}.

If the caller can guarantee that calls to Create() will provide acyclic graphs only when metaNeatGenome.IsAcyclic is true, then validateAcyclic can be set to false to avoid the cost of the cyclic graph check (which is relatively expensive to perform).

Parameters
metaNeatGenome
MetaNeatGenome<T>

Neat genome metadata.

validateAcyclic
bool

Enable acyclic graph validation.

Returns

A new instance of INeatGenomeBuilder{T}.
